presents: simple and accurate span - based model

presents.from sentence: To fill this gap , this paper presents a simple and accurate span - based model .

all possible labeled spans.from sentence: Inspired by recent span - based models in syntactic parsing and coreference resolution , our model directly scores all possible labeled spans based on span representations induced from neural networks .

decoding time.from sentence: At decoding time , we greedily select higher scoring labeled spans .

model parameters.from sentence: The model parameters are learned by optimizing loglikelihood of correct labeled spans .
